plays.text: Penalty to Steve Duchesne 2 minutes for Interference Brad Larsen

Penalty to Jiri Fischer 2 minutes for Obstruction - Interference Darius Kasparaitis

Penalty to Rob Blake 2 minutes for Holding Steve Yzerman
Penalty to Kirk Maltby 2 minutes for Roughing Patrick Roy

Penalty to Chris Chelios 2 minutes for Crosschecking Darius Kasparaitis
